UserReviews.quote: Super! I've waited years for a product like this, and it's finally here. Can't wait to try all the flavors that were delivered!
Magnificent! Product from this machine is simply Fantastic.
I've tasted better, and I've tasted worse. It's acceptable by my standards.
Having this smart little helper at home making Product for me, I have time to soak in the tub. Awesome!
I was so happy when it arrived. Too bad the company hasn't invested more in the technology. However, I was underwhelmed by the Product expulsion pressure.
Nice! I can make my own tomato Product.
Unfortunately, this appliance only comes with a limited range of options, none of which I like and the Product it makes is way too cold. Such a shame.
Product, you scream. Because it's too damn cold. That's basically the only problem I have with this product.
